admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Geothermal Exploration
            Project's main objective will be to explore the
            country's only known source of mineral energy to prove
            commercially exploitable geothermal reserves. In addition it
            will strengthen ISERST, the country's geothermal
            research institute, through appropriate technical
            assistance, and enable it to take a more active role in
            geothermal exploration and development operations. EDD, the
            country's electric power company, will be provided with
            assistance preparatory to incorporating geothermal power
            production facilities into its system. Project components
            include: (a) geothermal drilling in the Hanle/Gaggade area;
            (b) complementary surface exploration works in the same
            area; and (c) technical assistance to ISERST.
